Player History
Injured on 6/2/1962 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 5/7/1965 with a Bruised Finger, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 4/26/1969, off Charlie Lheureux (SYR)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/27/1969, off Chet Steadman (SYR)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Columbus on 11/1/1969...
Won World Championship with Ashburn in 1969...
Won Outstanding Newcomer Award in 1969, hitting .275 with 7 HR, 49 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 6/1/1971, hitting .404 with 4 HR, 19 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/11/1973, hitting .500 with 1 HR, 1 RBI...
Had 6 hits with 0 RBI against Coney Island on 7/8/1978...
Signed as a free agent by West Texas on 2/6/1979 to a 2-year deal worth $6,460,000 per year...
Had 22-game hitting streak snapped on 6/11/1980...
Won Slick Fielder Award at Shortstop in 1981...
Had 2000th career hit on 4/14/1982, off Michael Taylor (TRO)...
Injured on 4/27/1982 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 1-2 weeks...
